select m.device_code, m.device_name, m.id, u.id as device_user_id, um.name, um.sex, um.id_card, um.tel, CASE WHEN LENGTH(id_card) = 15 THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT('19', SUBSTR(id_card, 7, 2), '-', SUBSTR(id_card, 9, 2), '-', SUBSTR(id_card, 11, 2)), '%Y-%m-%d'), CURDATE()) WHEN LENGTH(id_card) = 18 THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(SUBSTR(id_card, 7, 4), '-', SUBSTR(id_card, 11, 2), '-', SUBSTR(id_card, 13, 2)), '%Y-%m-%d'), CURDATE()) END AS age, h.person, h.online, l.is_his as monitoring from device_management m left join device_user u on m.id = u.device_id and m.delete_flag = u.delete_flag and u.is_his = false left join user_management um on u.user_id = um.id and u.delete_flag = um.delete_flag left join device_heartbeat h on m.id = h.device_id and m.delete_flag = h.delete_flag left join device_monitor_log l on u.id = l.device_user_id and l.update_by is null where m.delete_flag = false
and m.device_name like '%${dto.deviceName}%'
and m.device_code like '%${dto.deviceCode}%'
and h.person = #{dto.state}
